apple_vendor_description: The kiss: man, man, light skin tone, medium skin tone emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving embrace with nuanced skin tones and Apple's signature glossy sheen. Each figure is crafted with smooth gradients and realistic lighting, highlighting their closeness and the tenderness of the kiss.  This emoji beautifully represents same-sex affection and romantic connection, rendered with Apple's commitment to inclusivity and expressive detail.
